LABEL: Smash cards
TEXT: FireBlade cards with the word "Smash" in the name are powerful attack cards that #yExhaust.
A few character specific relics interact with these cards.

LABEL: Endurance cards
TEXT: FireBlade cards with the word "Endurance" in the name are powerful defensive skill cards that exhaust.
A few character specific relics interact with these cards.

LABEL: Burning
TEXT: Several FireBlade cards inflict #yBurning.  This damage is dealt every turn.
A few character specific relics interact with these cards.
